duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for labeling, portioning, meal bagging/kitting, and shipping while adhering to all floor safety and food safety standard operating procedures (SOPs).
Receive direction from Supervisor or Production Lead to fulfill production requirements
Label packaging at the standard average rate
Use proper measuring utensils to portion ingredients
Pay strong attention to detail while picking ingredients in the meal bagging/kitting process
Work at a fast pace with strong attention to detail in shipping operations
Work as a team to reach shipping goals
Follow all GMPs while onsite at the facilities
Keep work area clean at all times and assist in EOD clean ups
Adhere to all safety guidelines (i.e. proper lifting techniques)
Support the efforts of the company to maintain our food safety system (SQF) and quality programs

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma preferred but not required
